title: Yelp Stock Is Up Because Groupon Might Want to Buy the Company
text:
Shares of Groupon and Yelp moved in opposite directions Thursday in the wake of a report that the former company might be looking to buy the latter.

The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday night that the digital deals company ”is pursuing an acquisition amid discontent among shareholders about the firm’s financial performance and stock price”—and was, according to unnamed sources, potentially considering internet merchant ratings company Yelp (ticker: YELP). description: The Wall Street Journal reported that Groupon might be looking to purchase the online review site operator Yelp. Groupon and Yelp stock had very different reactions.
